upcomingEvents.title: Yamuna River Cleaning Drive
upcomingEvents.description: Join 500+ volunteers in cleaning the sacred Yamuna river banks in Delhi. Includes breakfast, cleaning supplies, and cultural program.

upcomingEvents.title: Ganga Aarti at Varanasi
upcomingEvents.description: Experience the divine evening Ganga Aarti ceremony at Dashashwamedh Ghat. Includes boat ride and traditional prasadam.

upcomingEvents.title: River Ecology Workshop
upcomingEvents.description: 3-day intensive workshop on river ecosystems, water conservation, and sustainable practices. Includes field trips and certification.

upcomingEvents.title: Sacred Narmada Boat Tour
upcomingEvents.description: Spiritual boat journey along the sacred Narmada river with cultural storytelling and traditional music.

recentEvents.title: Narmada River Cleaning
recentEvents.description: Successfully cleaned 5km stretch of Narmada riverbank in Madhya Pradesh with 250+ volunteers. Collected 2 tons of waste.

recentEvents.title: Youth Education Camp
recentEvents.description: Conducted 3-day river awareness camp for 150 students from 10 schools. Included field trips and interactive sessions.

recentEvents.title: Saraswati River Prayer
recentEvents.description: Organized special prayer ceremony at Saraswati river site with 500+ devotees. Included cultural programs and prasadam.

featuredEvents.title: Daily Ganga Aarti Coverage
featuredEvents.description: Experience the divine evening Ganga Aarti ceremony at various ghats including Varanasi, Haridwar, and Rishikesh. We provide live coverage, cultural context, and participation opportunities.

featuredEvents.title: Sacred Narmada Circumambulation
featuredEvents.description: Join the sacred 3,300 km Narmada Parikrama journey. We organize group pilgrimages, provide support, and document this transformative spiritual experience.

featuredEvents.title: Kumbh Mela Coverage
featuredEvents.description: Complete coverage of Kumbh Mela celebrations with live updates, cultural insights, and participation guides.

userEvents.title: Local Pond Cleaning Drive
userEvents.description: Organized cleaning of historic Katraj Lake with 50+ volunteers. Removed plastic waste and planted native plants.

userEvents.title: River Heritage Walk
userEvents.description: Conducted heritage walk along Chambal river sharing historical stories and cultural significance with 30 participants.

userEvents.title: Youth Water Awareness
userEvents.description: Organized water conservation workshop for 100+ school students with interactive games and practical demonstrations.

conservation.name: Conservation Events
conservation.description: River cleaning drives, tree plantation, water quality monitoring, and environmental awareness programs.

education.name: Educational Camps
education.description: River ecology workshops, Sanskrit learning camps, cultural heritage programs, and youth education initiatives.

spiritual.name: Spiritual Gatherings
spiritual.description: Ganga Aarti, river prayers, meditation sessions, pilgrimage tours, and sacred ritual ceremonies.

tourism.name: Tourism & Recreation
tourism.description: Boat rides, river rafting, cultural tours, photography expeditions, and heritage site visits.

community.name: Community Programs
community.description: Local water body events, user-organized activities, community festivals, and volunteer programs.

featured.name: Featured Events
featured.description: Major river festivals, Narmada Parikrama, Kumbh Mela coverage, and special cultural celebrations.
